title: KoRn - Live & Rare (320 kbps)     By      _Steffengd
description:

2. "Blind" (Live) (from Korn)  4:12
  
3. "Falling Away from Me" (Live) (from Issues)  4:15
   

4. "Right Now" (Live) (from Take a Look in the Mirror)  3:05
   
5. "Got the Life" (Live) (from Follow the Leader)  4:06
   
6. "Here to Stay" (Live) (from Untouchables  4:20
   
7. "Freak on a Leash" (Live) (from Follow the Leader)  4:25
  
8. "Another Brick in the Wall, Pts. (1,2,3)*1" (Live)(from Greatest Hits Vol.1)- 8:21

11. "A.D.I.D.A.S./Porno Creep" (Live) (from Life Is Peachy)  3:50
 
12. "Earache My Eye*3" (from Follow the Leader)  4:50
 
13. "Proud" (from I Know What You Did Last Summer Soundtrack)  3:26







*1 Pink Floyd cover song
*2 Metallica cover song
*3 Cheech and Chong cover song



                       



                           ALL SONGS RIPPED IN 320 KBPS QUALITY 











Live & Rare is a compilation album of band Korn that was released on May 9, 2006, and features thirteen tracks - all seven from the DVD featuring 2003's CBGB show in New York, which are found on special editions of Greatest Hits Vol. 1, two from Woodstock 1999, three cover songs (one a hidden track from Follow the Leader and another a hidden track from Take a Look in the Mirror), and "Proud" taken from the I Know What You Did Last Summer soundtrack. This compilation was released after Korn left Sony BMG Records, so it's likely the band had no contributions to the track listing. Also, there is no new material on this album, and most of the tracks are available on other releases, thus sales of this compilation were disappointing.

As of May 31, 2006, it has sold nearly 52,000 total copies in the United States.



















                               _Steffengd
